trans-unit.source: Represents a row of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> that can contain controls.
trans-unit.target: Representa una fila de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> que puede contener los controles.

trans-unit.source: The containing <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto contenedor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> class, specifying the containing <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />, especificando el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> que contiene.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />, including its nonclient elements, in pixels, relative to the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el tamaño y la ubicación del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />, incluyendo sus elementos no cliente, en píxeles, con respecto al control primario.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the size and location.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa el tamaño y la ubicación.

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A> property gets only the client elements of the control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A> property gets the nonclient and client elements.
trans-unit.target: Mientras el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A> propiedad obtiene solo el cliente de elementos del control, el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A> propiedad obtiene los elementos de cliente y no.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to be dragged and dropped into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> que se van a arrastrar y colocar en <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> can be dragged and dropped into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> se puede arrastrar y colocar en un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is enough space in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> to receive the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si hay bastante espacie en <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> para recibir <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the controls in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene los controles de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of controls.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de controles.

trans-unit.source: Gets the space, in pixels, that is specified by default between controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el espacio, en píxeles, que se especifica de manera predeterminada entre los controles.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> that represents the default space between controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> que representa el espacio predeterminado entre los controles.

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal spacing, in pixels, of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el espaciado interno, en píxeles, del contenido de un control.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> that represents the internal spacing of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> que representa el espaciado interno del contenido de un control.

trans-unit.source: Gets the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el área de presentación del control.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the size and location.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa el tamaño y la ubicación.

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A> property gets the nonclient and client elements, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A> property gets only the client elements of the control.
trans-unit.target: Mientras el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A> propiedad obtiene los elementos de cliente y no el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A> propiedad obtiene solo el cliente de elementos del control.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> para liberar tanto recursos administrados como no administrados; es <see langword="false" /> para liberar únicamente recursos no administrados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos no administrados que usa <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> y, de forma opcional, libera los recursos administrados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se llama a este método público `Dispose` método y <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` se invoca el protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método con el `disposing` parámetro establecido en `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` con `disposing` establecido en `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow> references.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el `disposing` del parámetro es true, este método libera todos los recursos retenidos por los objetos administrados que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow> referencias.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca al método `Dispose` de cada uno de los objetos a los que se hace referencia.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> puede recibir varias llamadas de otros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Al reemplazar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> tenga cuidado de no hacer referencia a objetos que se hayan eliminado en una llamada anterior a <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre cómo implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementa un método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de <see langword="Dispose" /> y <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpiar recursos no administrados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) y [reemplazar el método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the control's layout engine.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una instancia del motor de diseño del control.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> for the control's contents.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> para el contenido del control.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el espacio entre controles.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> representing the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> que representa el espacio entre los controles.

trans-unit.source: The original value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Valor original de la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" />.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Nuevo valor de la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando cambia la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se genera un evento, se invoca el controlador de eventos a través de un delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: El método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged%2A> también permite que las clases derivadas controlen el evento sin adjuntar ningún delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Ésta es la técnica preferida para controlar el evento en una clase derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Al reemplazar <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> en una clase derivada, asegúrese de llamar al método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> de la clase base para que los delegados registrados reciban el evento.

trans-unit.source: The control that was added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Control que se ha agregado a la <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index representing the position of the added control.
trans-unit.target: Índice de base cero que representa la posición del control agregado.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se genera un evento, se invoca el controlador de eventos a través de un delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: El método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded%2A> también permite que las clases derivadas controlen el evento sin adjuntar ningún delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Ésta es la técnica preferida para controlar el evento en una clase derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Al reemplazar <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> en una clase derivada, asegúrese de llamar al método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> de la clase base para que los delegados registrados reciban el evento.

trans-unit.source: The control that was removed from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: El control que se ha quitado de la <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index representing the position of the removed control.
trans-unit.target: Índice de base cero que representa la posición del control eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se genera un evento, se invoca el controlador de eventos a través de un delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: El método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved%2A> también permite que las clases derivadas controlen el evento sin adjuntar ningún delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Ésta es la técnica preferida para controlar el evento en una clase derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Al reemplazar <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> en una clase derivada, asegúrese de llamar al método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> de la clase base para que los delegados registrados reciban el evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se genera un evento, se invoca el controlador de eventos a través de un delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: El método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout%2A> también permite que las clases derivadas controlen el evento sin adjuntar ningún delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Ésta es la técnica preferida para controlar el evento en una clase derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Al reemplazar <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> en una clase derivada, asegúrese de llamar al método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> de la clase base para que los delegados registrados reciban el evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Orientation" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando cambia el valor de la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Orientation" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se genera un evento, se invoca el controlador de eventos a través de un delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: El método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged%2A> también permite que las clases derivadas controlen el evento sin adjuntar ningún delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Ésta es la técnica preferida para controlar el evento en una clase derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Al reemplazar <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged" /> en una clase derivada, asegúrese de llamar al método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged" /> de la clase base para que los delegados registrados reciban el evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the layout direction of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> relative to its containing <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la dirección del diseño de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> relativo al <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> que contiene.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno de los valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets padding within the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el relleno dentro del control.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> representing the control's internal spacing characteristics.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> que representa las características del espaciado interno del control.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> que contiene <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> que contiene el control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
